thread.title: Man United news: Jose Mourinho aims dig at Arsenal after Alexis Sanchez 'handball' goal | Metro News
thread.title_full: Man United news: Jose Mourinho aims dig at Arsenal after Alexis Sanchez 'handball' goal | Metro News

author: Chris Davie For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Man United news: Jose Mourinho aims dig at Arsenal after Alexis Sanchez 'handball' goal | Metro News
text:
Chris Davie for Metro.co.uk Saturday 11 Feb 2017 7:25 pm Jose Mourinho has aimed a dig at Arsenal. (Getty Images) 
Jose Mourinho has aimed a dig at ‘lucky’ Arsenal following Manchester United’s 2-0 victory over Watford. 
The Gunners ended their run of consecutive defeats in the Premier League with a win over Hull City on Saturday. 
Alexis Sanchez scored both goals but his opener in the first half caused controversy after the ball rebounded off his arm from close range. 
‘You know, other teams are good teams, other teams are lucky teams,’ said Mourinho. Sanchez opened the scoring for Arsenal with his hand. (Getty Images)
